metadata.title: CVE-2018-1311 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The Apache Xerces-C 3.0.0 to 3.2.3 XML parser contains a use-after-freeerror triggered during the scanning of external DTDs. This flaw has notbeen addressed in the maintained version of the library and has no currentmitigation other than to disable DTD processing. This can be accomplishedvia the DOM using a standard parser feature, or via SAX using theXERCES_DISABLE_DTD environment variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1311` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxerces-c-samples - 3.2.3+debian-3ubuntu0.1
libxerces-c3.2 - 3.2.3+debian-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.3+debian-3ubuntu0.1').
